name: Sex Campus Story 🔞
description:
Embark on an exciting adventure as the main character in "Sex Campus Story," a visually stunning adult visual novel. You play the role of an ordinary student from an ordinary family, living a mundane life. However, everything changes when you form an unlikely friendship with Met, the spoiled son of the university president, who also happens to be your classmate.

Your story begins in a car as you and Met ride to the university after a weekend break. As you engage in conversation, you reveal your academic struggles, teetering on the brink of expulsion. Met offers to help by utilizing his connections but presents a challenge. Within 7 days, you must seduce two of the "most unattainable girls in the district," who reside in the university dormitory. Only then will Met plead with his father to save you. As proof of your success, you must obtain the prized panties of these girls.

The first girl, Diana, is calculating, manipulative, and highly intelligent. She has exploited and drained the life out of countless boys who tried to win her over but never succeeded. Her only weakness is her love for risk and gambling.

The second girl, Katie, is timid, shy, and morally upright. She has proven to be an impenetrable fortress for suitors due to her strong sense of responsibility and virtue. However, she faces significant academic challenges with one of her professors.

The third girl is Alita, the professor herself. She is authoritative, solitary, strict, and formidable. When you attempt to seek her assistance for Katie, she has her own plans. You must please Alita and acquiesce to her demands before she agrees to help Katie. Once you achieve success with one of the girls, you encounter Met and eagerly boast about your achievements.

Immerse yourself in a world of sexual passion, moral dilemmas, and unpredictable plot twists in the adult visual novel, "Sex Campus Story." You decide how to navigate the tangled relationships, unravel the dark secrets of the girls, and experience an unforgettable journey filled with desire and suspense.

Features:
  • Plenty of lewd scenes with various girls
  • A fascinating story
  • A Multitude of Sexy Situations
  • Real-time 3D character and animations
  • Minigames
  • Ability to play with one hand. ( ͡~ ͜ʖ ͡°)
